item.title: Black Bean Dip
item.description: This recipe comes by way of my aunt Marilee. It was a crowd favorite growing up, and is absolutely amazing by the water on a hot sunny day! Instructions Combine marinade ingredients in a shaker bottle Shake… shake… shake… yeaaaha! Pour marinade over beans and corn in a big bowl Let sit in fridge for 3 hours minimum, overnight if possible Drain marinade Add green onion and feta cheese Serve with fritos and/or scoop chips of choice!
